metadata.Title: CVE-2019-16392 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description:
SPIP before 3.1.11 and 3.2 before 3.2.5 allows prive/formulaires/login.php XSS via error messages.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2019-16392` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

spip - 3.2.5-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: spip package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.2.5-1').
